stories.text:
I can see why humans fight people with different beliefs, culture, and language, but Russians and Ukrainians share such an extensive cultural background.

Is it foolish to expect soldiers to refuse the direct combat in another unnecessary war?
stories.title: Ask HN: Could it be possible for Russian and Ukrainian Troops to refuse combat?
RetroArch NetPlay enables you to play games online
Linus Tech Tips [video] - topic is lost data
When light loses symmetry, it can hold particles

stories.text: Sometimes it feels like you miss the “best of” HN - people may find something interesting/helpful in your favourites
stories.title: Ask HN: Post Your “Favourited” Links
New ultra-fast 3D printer works like a reverse scanner

stories.text:
Hi all, I’ve failed a test because despite knowing the answer I’ve given the wrong one, and this is something that happens to me from time to time in various situations. I suppose it’s a lack of focus, but don’t know if it’s the only problem. What are your ways to cope with this? 
Right now I’m a full time worker getting a second degree in CS (first one was in Electrical Engineering).
Thank you!
stories.title: Ask HN: How to maintain focus during tests?
Atari Breakout: The Best Video Game of All Time?
